text: was a Japanese organizational theorist. He was a professor at the Graduate School of International Corporate Strategy of the Hitotsubashi University. He was best known for his study of knowledge management. Nonaka was born in Tokyo, Japan. Nonaka died from pneumonia in Tokyo on 25 January 2025, at the age of 89. ==References== ==Other websites== * Biography at Hitotsubashi University Category:1935 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Japanese academics Category:Sociologists Category:Scientists from Tokyo Category:Writers from Tokyo
title: Ikujiro Nonaka
